normalized: a city, on which the curtain of night had fallen.
glaring lights illuminated the windows of a veritable forest of buildings, and the signboards of stores were tinted by decorative lighting, almost to the point of gaudiness.
as if it had forgotten about calm, forgotten about sleep, it was overflowing with noise.
a place just barely out of reach of that illumination.
a place just barely out of reach of that clatter.
a place enveloped in darkness and silence all around it.
──a building's rooftop.
after rain, puddles of water were scattered all around the floor.
a woman quietly swooped down upon that roof.
making sure to get lost in the shadows from what little light reached it.
making sure to muffle the sound of her footsteps with what little noise carried that far.
however, the woman―who had strengthened her entire body with a suit made of special materials―possessed an imposing, even bewitching presence, and stood back up on the spot.
she glared at a certain spot.
her name was asagi.
taimanin asagi.
she was the kunoichi with the greatest strength among all the taimanin, who had destroyed her archenemy, the oboro ninja army, and their chaos arena.
at one point, asagi had been captured by oboro, the leader of the oboro ninja army, who supervised the chaos arena.
brutal sexual bodily remodelling had been performed on her entire body.
her sensitivity had been raised to its limit.
her body had ended up becoming so sensitive that, if she were a normal person, she would go mad and die just from being touched.
in a state like that, she was made to participate in the sadistic shows which took place in that arena of darkness, the chaos arena.
her sister, sakura, had been taken hostage, and asagi's shinobi powers had been sealed off.
even when her stomach was punched, or her neck was wrung, her body, which had become unbelievably sensitive, wound up experiencing pleasure.
as a result, she had exposed an unsightly appearance, with all eyes upon her.
meanwhile, like asagi, her younger sister sakura had also been given the same bodily remodelling, and her body had been subjected to cruelty.
furthermore, she had been forced to do battle with her older sister, asagi, in the arena.
however, having sakura's assistance in that battle, asagi was able to take oboro by surprise.
they had utterly defeated oboro and caused the chaos arena to collapse, and, at the same time, had also delivered a serious blow to nomad, the organization supporting her.

after that incident, the taimanin, which had been an unlawful organization, were incorporated into the public safety intelligence agency, third investigation division 〈section three〉 as an official government organization.

the third investigation division 〈section three〉, which had taken in the taimanin, had capitalized on the shinobi's strength immediately, and started to investigate and infiltrate the organization that controlled anartificial island on tokyo bay.
in the middle of that, a separate matter had barged its way in.
its subject was the extermination of creatures living in hell that had slipped into the human world.
they had reports that humans were being brutally killed one after another by these creatures, which were known as majuu (demonic beasts) in the human world.
without the taimanin, special people who had anti-demon powers, they could not fight against the majuu.
thus, though none of them were exactly free, the job had been left to a taimanin who was not participating in an investigation mission.
in other words, her.
to this taimanin――igawa asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: so you thought to hide in surprise, huh?
or are you just timid?
asagi shot provocative words in the direction she was glaring toward.
zah.
the focus of asagi's gaze was a water tank, such as might be found on the rooftop of any building.
there, a shadow ran.
the shadow sprang out onto the water storage tank for a moment, making a loud noise, and jumped from there.
taking a small distance from asagi, it nimbly landed, avoiding the puddles.
it was a beast which gave the impression of a cat that had grown a huge horn, and was about one size larger than a tiger.
looking at the majuu, which had come into sight, asagi grimaced.
that was not because she was hesitant.
it was because she felt anger.
the majuu was holding a human in its mouth.
a lump of meat with no lower body, the innards of which had become exposed.

name: asagi
normalized: sorry, but i don't have the time to fetch an animal trainer.
please die here.
asagi slowly lowered her waist.
having seen that, the majuu shook its head and flung away the lump of flesh.
then it lowered its head, and pushed its hips up high to intimidate her.

name: asagi
normalized: this beast of hell is just like a cat, huh?
roaring at asagi's provocation, the majuu kicked off the ground with its powerful hind legs.
asagi unsheathed her katana as she, too, sprang forward almost simultaneously.

name: asagi
normalized: fuh!
a side-sweeping attack, unleashing her sword, which she held in a backhand grip, at the speed of light.
the majuu also swung the claws of its gigantic foreleg downwards, using the force from having kicked off the ground.
sword and claw clashed with tremendous speed, giving off sparks.
in addition to that, after a brief moment, the majuu immediately swung its opposite foreleg from the side.
once she successfully lured those claws, she took a half-step back and drew her sword.
the majuu's sharp claws passed by in front of asagi's eyes.
having dodged them, asagi cut around to the side of the majuu with speed referred to as the greatest among the taimanin.
and then, she went for it.

name: asagi
normalized: haah!
she focused her spiritual energy, and fired a light- speed strike from the side.
the next moment, the majuu split right in half――
or, should have.

name: asagi
normalized: wha?!
asagi's sword, which was filled with anti-demon power, had definitely caught the majuu's torso.
however, far from tearing it apart, the sword was repelled by its sturdy body hair, of all things.
it was like it was wearing armour that was harder than steel.
taking advantage of asagi's movement having stopped for a moment, the majuu tore through the air as it swung its claws downward again.

name: asagi
normalized: h!
asagi dodged them by leaping far backward, and took a distance from it.

name: asagi
normalized: …hard.
and fast.
its light-speed rivalled asagi's―no, its speed might have been even greater than that.
even though they had just exchanged attacks, it readied its posture again, and leapt forward with its strong hind legs.
asagi's sword was hindered by that surprisingly sturdy body hair, and couldn't even scratch it.
the majuu charged towards asagi, who had stopped her feet.
making sure to weave its way around the puddles that dotted the floor.
pointing its horn, which was even larger than the sword asagi held, right at her.
head on, with lightning speed.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh…!
facing the majuu, which was heading for her, asagi…
